params.newTranche: the interest rate of the new tranche

params.newAuctionDuration: number of seconds of the duration

params.newAuctionPriceFactor: the new factor multiplied to the loan to value

params.currency: the erc20 on which a new borrow amount lower bound is taking effect
the erc20 on which a new minimum borrow cost will take effect
params.newMinOfferCost: the new minimum amount that will need to be repaid per loan offer used

createTranche(uint256).notice: creates a new tranche at a new identifier for lenders to provide offers for

setAuctionDuration(uint256).notice: sets the time it takes to auction prices to fall to 0 for future loans

setAuctionPriceFactor(uint256).notice: sets the factor applied to the loan to value setting initial price of auction for future loans

setBorrowAmountPerOfferLowerBound(addres.notice: updates the borrow amount lower bound per offer for one currency

setMinOfferCost(address,uint256).notice: updates the minimum amount to repay per used loan offer when borrowing a certain currency
